name: voice-book
description: App to make tts for books

scripts.build: npm run client:ci-and-build && npm run server:ci-and-build
scripts.server:ci-and-build: cd server && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.client:ci-and-build: cd client && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build-witout-ci: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && cd server && npm run build
